response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $11,000 for you. This is a unique opportunity to secure an asset that is worth $12,000 to you, at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 11000}
